General.Name: Eveready Industries India Limited
General.Description: Eveready Industries India Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and markets dry cell and rechargeable batteries, flashlights, and lighting and electrical products in India. It offers various batteries comprising zinc carbon, alkaline, and rechargeable batteries. The company provides rechargeable, plastic, brass, and aluminum torches, and light-emitting diode (LED) flashlights, as well as digiLED portable lanterns. In addition, it offers consumer lighting products, such as LED bulbs, emergency LEDs, smart ambient lighting, LED panels, LED downlights, LED spotlights, LED battens, LED flood lights, and LED streetlights; and professional lighting products, including indoor commercial, industrial, and outdoor lighting products, as well as provides spike guards. Further, the company distributes electrical products. It offers its products under Eveready, PowerCell, Shakti, and Uniross brands names. Eveready Industries India Limited was founded in 1905 and is based in Kolkata, India.
